name: drones (oubliette #4)
description:
* if you get an error about 'length' being null, please refresh the page. if you refresh the page enough, it will start working. i do not know how to fix this.

* requires keyboard, may have controller support, does not work on touch screens so don't try phones/tablets (they have some kind of error anyway)

created over 4 days while my ears were plugged with wax. i didn't know where else to go, so here it is, a little place for you to play around in. try to see everything! get lots of money!

~

i used GIMP, Godot, Tiled, and Bfxr

thank you to all four wonderful tools
